description.message: LGTM (Looks Good To Me) lets you put image urls directly into a text field when you're happy with what you're seeing.

options_description.message:
LGTM (Looks Good To Me) is a Safari extension that lets you copy (or insert into text fields) image when you're happy with what you're seeing.

Make sure to enable it and set all required permissions in Safari's extensions tab.

Full source code is available at https://github.com/rafalgrodzinski/lgtm.
